attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible. It doesn‚Äôt give me the information I want and it has way too many bugs that must be fixed. I‚Äôve had it for about 6 months and I‚Äôve had to restart my phone because of the freezing screens and bugs that come from this app too many times I‚Äôve lost count. This app is a disgrace and I don‚Äôt understand why Trump has his own app in the first place. There is no need for it I could look up everything that is in this app on the web and find better answers than in this app. DISGUISTING.
attributes.title: Absolutely terrible

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app because I‚Äôm a liberal and all my friends are trump supporters. I don‚Äôt want to lose my friends so I got this app in the hope that it would make me like trump. the app downloaded, and I‚Äôm just sitting there. It‚Äôs telling me all this news about how trump is the best, but suddenly a bullet pierced my screen. I closed the app and it was still there. I had to turn off and on my phone again to fix it. Then when I went back on, 18 more bullet holes pierced my screen. Every time there were more. My friends don‚Äôt have this happen to them. It won‚Äôt let me read anything because of the bullet holes. I came to the conclusion that this is a racist app. I don‚Äôt recommend if you aren‚Äôt a straight, cis, white male.
attributes.title: Racist

attributes.review: I originally downloaded this app to support our current president, Donald Trump but that soon changed. I saw comments from other people saying that trump was racist and sexualized women so of course I searched it up. It ended up being proved true on multiple occasions. I am extremely disappointed in our president we currently have and the things he‚Äôs done. I pray that he doesn‚Äôt win the next election and ends up paying for what he‚Äôs done. I would not recommend this app because it is biased and uninformative. It leaves out any possible cons and just focuses on the ‚Äúgood‚Äù things he‚Äôs done. I‚Äôm a proud republican but I will vote for Biden in the next election without hesitation. Please don‚Äôt believe what everyone says on this app.
attributes.title: Very disappointed
